ComicInfo.Summary:
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.
A cynical look at justice, mistakes, approval, ambition, philosophy, politics, technology, entertainment, therapy, neatness, gas stations, the office, tradeoffs, and doctors.
ComicInfo.Tags: Dr. Dre,Roger Kaputnik,Cowardly Lion,Eminem,Doctor Forman,Dorothy Gale,Lighter Side Doctor,Larry King,Jay Z,White Spy,Johnny Knoxville,Method Man,Monroe,Busta Rhymes,Lil' Kim,Snoop Dogg,Scarecrow,Will Smith,Alfred E. Neuman,Bill Gaines,Tin Woodman,P. Diddy,Toto,Elmo,Black Spy
ComicInfo.Title: Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; Sluts in the City; Mad’s Complete Guide to Shipping Your Aging Relative Off to a Nursing Home; Questions You Never Want to Be Asked on a Summer Job Application; Blind Man’s Fluff; Monroe and… Jackass; Rejected Reality TV Shows; One Fine Day Along the Yellow Brick Road; The Lighter Side of...; Rap Music Predictions for the Coming Year; You’ve Officially Become Your Mother/Father When…; A Mad Look at Jackass
